EXERCISEVII



398
CHAPTER 17 ■Refutation
1.  In Chapter 22 below, Searle tries to refute Turing by means of parallel rea-
soning about a Chinese room. Using the standards discussed above, assess
Searle’s attempted refutation.
2.  In St. Anselm’s Proslogion with a Reply on Behalf of the Fool by Gaunilo and the
Author’s Reply to Gaunilo, trans. M. J. Charlesworth (Oxford: Clarendon
